I had mixed feelings for "Les Valseuses" (1974) written and directed by Bertrand Blier when I started watching it but I ended up loving it. "Les Valseuses" was originally a novel that French film-maker Luc Besson wrote to keep his love for Catherine Deneuve from going away.
